name: LittLe FiRe
description:
EVERYTHING IS ON FIRE!

Game designed and developed for the Brackeys Game Jam.

HOW TO PLAY:
  • Use A and D to move.
  • Hold W to jump, the longer you hold it the better the jump.

(...now the difficult part)

  • Use right-click to shoot orbs.
  • Use right-click again to stop them in mid-air.
  • Use the mouse wheel to change between orbs.(Light/Darkness)
  • Use Q to make all the orbs explode.
  • Use P to pause the game.
GAMEPLAY:

You, as a creature of light, can go through the orbs of light, but you cannot go through the orbs of darkness, this will help you reach higher spaces, the creatures of darkness can go through the orbs of darkness but not the light orbs.

The orbs self-destruct after a while, this of course, if you had not destroyed them before.

Try to reach the star, avoid being touched by any dark monsters and have fun playing. 

Also, there are birds in there.
